Articles.Content:
As the title says can someone make a plane for the kethane pack. I would like to be easy to fly to. Also could it have all the equipment so it can land mine some and convert it or pump it back to base. I don't want to go into space and don't want to go to fast or to slow. Here a link to the mod pack.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/13692-Mechanical-Mouse-Industries-Kethane-Payload-Packs-Released%21%21%21
i have one its called te VM-1 but i don't know how to give you the file exept for an email (Pm me if you want to do it that way) sorry for the inconvinence :/

Finnaly i Leveled up and i am a bottle rocketeer so here is the plane

Use sas the entire trip and it tends to pitch up very slightly, but very good plane. i got to the north pole and back with 1.5 refuels =)
